sentence: The Hyat is definitely the nicest of the hotels in its surrounding area and there are many places to walk to for dining and activities
The beach area was great with lots of opportunities to participate in water sports or to just relax
Had a couples massage and the spa was great too
They have a water slide lovely pool bar at the pool a coffee shop beautiful beach with water sports
This hotel was centrally located to many restaurants and activities
Palm Beach has calm warm water perfect for swimming or just floating and every possible water activity is available
The beach is wonderful with a lot of shade hard to find in Aruba and just the right amount of activities
My favorite parts were all the activities the hotel had and being on the beach for sure
the Ritz is just down the beachThe Spa Olga the therapist was phenomenal
The gym is where we started our day and was clean and stocked with fresh fruit and cold towels
Spa was a disappointing experience because that was under construction also
I think that putts the player at a great disadvantage
They booked our services in the lobby not saying a word about what was going on and leading us to believe that we would be taken to the spa when we got our massages
Lot of activities to do on the Island
Though it started out a little rough beware of the construction being done on the spa
Concierge services are more than helpful securing reservations for both dining out and activities
There are many venues including bars restaurants and activity businesses in walking distance so you do not need to travel far
We prefer the upper pool as it was quieter and not so many loud crowds playing volleyball or boozing
